Title: Urdu and Arabic enabled Text Box control
Description:
I want to create a user control i.e. textbox that will contain the functionality to type ARABIC or URDU .
Initially i am using these two languages but later it will be expanded. I want to handle it by unicode so that storing textbox data to database and displaying data back to textbox will be handled.
I want to develope it using C#. Any help or guidance will be appreciated.
HomeWiki:
Urdu Arabic Enabled TextBox control.
